title: chrisEvan2
author: chrisEvan2
content: We are heavily mining filecoin and chia, but you know the current situation of these two, so we have to mine some forked coins, so the hard disk can only mine these, I hope some forks can be before, we have dug a bunch of forked coins, if Someone wants us to airdrop to everyone, the first one is cryptodoge.cc, this is a fork of chia, it looks like memecoin, the good thing is that its currency has a game to play, leave your XCD address, I will give it to you 10,000 airdrops。

comments.author: Maliceprime
comments.body: Crypto doge.cc a fork of chia project? That's not real   probably a scam or something because Chia never had a fork of any new coin, where did you hear this from?.this looks like a scam topic, no one do such for nothing what is your aim here mate?.
